pages.title: Task Queue
pages.text: Ask your companion to perform tasks via AI chat. Tasks are queued and executed in order.$(br2)Available tasks:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Farm Area$() — Harvest, hoe, and replant crops$(li)$(bold)Mine Blocks$() — Clear blocks in an area$(li)$(bold)Mine Ores$() — Find and mine ore blocks$(li)$(bold)Chop Trees$() — Cut down nearby trees$(li)$(bold)Gather Blocks$() — Collect specific block types

pages.title: Task Progress
pages.text: The companion reports progress every 10 seconds.$(br2)Use $(thing)!status$() to check current task and queue.$(br2)Use $(thing)!cancel$() to stop all tasks.$(br2)Progress percentage is shown in the HUD overlay and in chat messages.
